page.title: 17Ashington Trout Farm
page.content: 1 {Mr Taylor}owns the Ashington Trout Farm and lives on the premises in the Old Malt Farm. He started the business there 6 years ago using the{natural {spring}from the chalk Downs with its constant temperature of 10 deg.C. He dug out 7 small lakes and in these he keeps 2,000{Rainbow Trout. They are brought from Hampshire weighing 8 to 10 oz. and are kept for 2 to 3 weeks being sold when they weigh 14 oz. In the summer customers come to fish for the Trout using maggots and sweetcorn for bait. Large orders of trout are netted and taken away live in oxygenated tanks. All fish are starved for two days before being sold. Some of the other ornamental fish which are stocked at the farm include; {Goldfish, Golden Orfe and Koi Carp.
